Class Monster

java.lang.Object
Entity
Immobile
Monster
public class Monster
extends Immobile
This class represents the monster of the game.

  • Field Summary

    Fields 
    Modifier and Type Field Description
    private boolean collision
    This variable is true if the player collides the monster, but it is false of the player does not collide the monster.
    static int DEFAULT_HEIGHT
    This is default value of the height monster's image.
    static int DEFAULT_WIDTH
    This is default value of the width monster's image.

    Fields inherited from class Entity

    DEFAULT_SPEED, game, height, speed, width, x, xMove, y, yMove
